728552f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Union Place
728552f-a.text:
Bay Street, at the N. W. corner of Union Place
(left), showing the clearance for the Paramount
Buiiding, site of the old Cornelius Vanderbilt House.
On the extreme left is the Pape Building, on Union
Place.
February 9, 1930
P. 1. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
Viewing northwestward across the clearance, from
Union Place.
February 9, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The Pape Building, on the south side of Union
Place, seen across Bay Street and the clearance.
February 9, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728552f-a.folder: Bay Street & Union Place, Staten Island, NY

728550f-c.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Union Place
728550f-c.text:
Bay Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Union Place, showing
the Vanderbilt House. Commodore Cornelius Vanderbilt spent the years
of his early manhood here.
Ebout 1905
By Eugene G. Putnam.
From Staten IIsland Wuseum Collection.
Through P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIOES.
(2) The same, years later.
February 7, 1920
By William t. Davis through P.L.Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS
3) The aite of the Vanderbilt House, viewing east along
the north side of Union Place from Beach to Bay Streets,
and showing operations for the erection of the Paramount
Buildins.
N.L.Cperr  Tebmuary 10,1930
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728550f-c.folder: Bay Street & Union Place, Staten Island, NY

728551f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Union Place
728551f-a.text:
Bay Street, adioining the N.W. corner of Union Place,
showing the Vanderbilt Houss. Eere Commodore Cornelius
Vanderbilt spent the years of his early manhood. The maps
of 1907 and 1917 show the house to be on property belonging to
Charles Rosenberg.
1924
Views 1,2 and 3
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728551f-a.folder: Bay Street & Union Place, Staten Island, NY

728507f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Cross Street
728507f-a.text:
577 Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Cross Street,
showing the Stapleton branch of the Bank of America.
Juno 13, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
